title: Enhancing Practical Programming Competencies: Strengthening Basic Nursing Skills and Clinical Reasoning through Simulation-Based Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory Knowledge and Clinical Practicum Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic nursing skills (e.g., physical assessment, infection control) with ≥90% accuracy using virtual patient scenarios.
Learners can derive ≥3 clinical rationales by analyzing patient data collected in a simulation environment.
Learners can systematically apply the planning-execution-evaluation stages of the nursing process through multimedia learning materials and academic assignments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
